name: La Quinta Inn Oakland Airport Coliseum

reviews.title: Just OK
reviews.text: This was fine for a quick night before or after a flight. The front desk always seemed to be having problems. No ice other than 1st floor. I overheard several people complaining about the shuttle.

We stayed one night on July 16, 2005 as we were going to an A's game on the Sunday. The room was clean and tidy and the pool was great for our seven year old. The breakfast the next day was incredible - cereal, waffles, fruit, yoghurt, muffins, bagels, etc. We walked to the game - make sure you walk past the truck dealership. We would stay hear again if we were in the area.
reviews.title: Great location
Price is Right -- but don't rely on evening Shuttle
reviews.text: We just had a one night stay after driving from northern(er) California to catch a 6 am plane. We choose this hotel because it advertised 24 hour shuttle service, was close to the airport, and inexpensive (relatively, nothing is truly inexpensive in California). Very basic rooms and bathrooms, clean and no problems with noise.

aka: La Quinta Inn Oakland Airport Coliseum Hotel
